APPEARANCE.name: Last of Mohicans Living of the Dead MacGuffin

description:
* Based on the popular manga by http://anidb.net/cr6124 [Sorachi Hideaki].
http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Sakata Gintoki] is a samurai living in an era when samurais are no longer needed. To add to his troubles, oppressive aliens have moved in to invade. Gintoki lives with http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] and http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shimura Shinpachi], taking on odd jobs to make the world a better place... and to pay their rent.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Long ago, this nation was known as the land of the samurai. The dream-filled Edo skies, upon which the samurai once gazed, are now filled with the ships of the Amanto, beings that suddenly invaded and rose to power. And now these arrogant aliens walk the streets of the city. The samurai have lost their swords, status, and even their honor… In this city former samurai Gintoki Sakata runs the Odd Jobs business. One day he receives a visit from a client named Katoken. To regain something he has lost, Katoken needs 30 million ryo—a lot of money. After listening to Katoken’s endless tale of misfortune, the Odd Jobs trio feels obliged to help out. Meanwhile, the Amanto Kariya and his men gather to plot the takeover of Edo city
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Habt ihr erstmal eine Silberseele, Ihr Bastarde!
Temeeraaaa!! Soredemo Gintama Tsuiten no kaaaa! (Zenpen)
You Jerks! And You Claim to Have Gintama?! (Part 1)
てめーらァァァ!!それでも銀魂ついてんのかァァァ! (前編)

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki manage to escape Shishimura’s sudden attack. Regrouping with Kagura and the others, he finds that their client Katoken was unable to stick with the training and has left. Gintoki finds Katoken drowning in his sorrows alone and joins him for a drink to share his wisdom: “No matter how much you try, you cannot escape from what you truly wish to forget.” Hearing those words, Katoken explains the reason behind his wanting to become stronger. Gintoki decides to lend a hand to help Katoken regain his most important treasure. Together with Kagura and Shinpachi, they march into the Drift Star Embassy… only to find themselves welcomed by a mountain full of food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Habt ihr erstmal eine Silberseele, Ihr Bastarde! - Teil 2
Temeeraaaa!! Soredemo Gintama Tsuiten no kaaaa! (Kouhen)
You Jerks! And You Claim to Have Gintama?! (Part 2)
てめーらァァァ!! それでも銀魂ついてんのかァァァ! (後編)

REGULAR.description:
The arrival of the Amanto has forced the samurai to throw away their swords. But Shinpachi’s father lived by the way of the sword, never losing his samurai honor. With his dying breath, the father entrusts his two children with the samurai spirit. To protect the dojo left behind by his father, Shinpachi works hard at jobs he’s not used to doing. But to a boy who knows only swordsmanship, the world is not a kind place. When Shinpachi is ridiculed by his manager and laughed at by the Amanto, one man stands up to confront them. Shinpachi sees an honest samurai within the man as he pounds down the manager and wipes out the Amanto for ruining his chocolate parfait. Yes, this man is in fact Gintoki Sakata, also known as “Odd Jobs Gin.” The Last Samurai with naturally wavy hair for a trademark?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nobody with Naturally Wavy Hair Can Be That Bad
Tennen Perm ni Warui Yatsu wa Inai
Unter Naturlockenträgern gibt es keine bösen Menschen!
天然パーマに悪い奴はいない

REGULAR.description:
Half a month has passed since Shinpachi began working for Odd Jobs Gin. Unable to see in Gintoki the glowing samurai spirit he felt, Shinpachi is already regretting his decision. One day as Gintoki and Shinpachi ride double on their scooter, a girl suddenly jumps in front of them. Unable to stop, Gintoki runs over the girl. Gintoki rushes the injured and unconscious girl toward the hospital, when suddenly a black car blocks the way and opens fire. While Gintoki and Shinpachi panic, the girl regains consciousness and blocks the bullets and wipes out the attackers with her built-in gun umbrella. There’s a reason the yakuza are after her, and Shinpachi decides to help the girl escape. However…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beachtet, dass das Shonen-Jump Magazin von Zeit zu Zeit auch Samstags erscheint!
Jump wa Tokidoki Doyou ni Deru Kara Ki o Tsukero
Watch Out! Weekly Shonen Jump Sometimes Comes Out on Saturdays!
ジャンプは時々土曜にでるから気をつけろ

REGULAR.description:
The staff of Odd Jobs Gin is going about their usual daily bickering when a delivery scooter crashes into the Otose Snack House downstairs. Barely conscious, the postman begs the Odd Jobs Trio to deliver an important package in his place. Gintoki and the others reluctantly head to the address on the package, Embassy of Inui, the Dog Star system. But the package explodes, and the trio are mistaken as terrorists. The three attempt a hasty escape, but when Shinpachi is caught, he decides to take Gintoki and Kagura down with him, and the gatekeepers quickly corner the three. Just when everybody thinks they are done for, they are saved by Gintoki’s old acquaintance Kotaro Katsura, aka Zura. Secretly observing the whole incident, the government’s police force, the Shinsengumi, decides to make their move…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jijii ni Natte mo Ada Na de Yobiaeru Tomodachi o Tsukure
Make Friends You Can Call by Their Nicknames, Even When You`re an Old Fart
Schafft euch Freunde mit Spitznamen an!
ジジィになってもあだ名で呼び合える友達を作れ

REGULAR.description:
Although their actions result in saving everyone from Katsura’s bomb, Gintoki and the group are nonetheless held for police questioning. Convinced Odd Jobs Gin are behind the bombing, the police continue their interrogation, when Shinpachi, who was staring at the clock the whole time, finally snaps. Baffled by his raging fit, the police finally let the trio go. Ignoring Gintoki and Kagura who vent their resentment in front of the police station, Shinpachi leaves the scene in a hurry. Left behind, Gintoki and Kagura come across an escaped convict being chased by the police. The man takes Kagura hostage and orders Gintoki to take the wheel in the police car. When asked by Gintoki why he ran away the man answers, “Because today is a special day…”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Einmal gegebene Versprechen hält man bis zum Tod!
Ichido Shita Yakusoku wa Shinde mo Mamore
Keep a Promise Even If It Kills You
一度した約束は死んでも守れ

REGULAR.description:
Midland Star Prince Hata’s pet Pes disappears, and the Immigration Bureau, though resentful of the Amanto’s orders, ask Odd Jobs Gin to look for the missing pet. Hearing that the client is an Amanto, the Odd Jobs at first turn down the offer but quickly change their minds when they are presented with a stack of cash. So begins Gintoki and group’s hunt for the pet. Looking for any kind of lead, the group makes the rounds of the octopus fisherman at the piers, takoyaki stores, and bars, but Pes is nowhere to be found. With few options left, Gintoki brings out his ultimate weapon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Halter von Haustieren tragen auch die Verantwortung!
Pet wa Kainushi ga Sekinin o Motte Saigo Made Medou o Mimashou
Responsible Owners Should Clean Up After Their Pets
ペットは飼い主が責任をもって最後まで面倒をみましょう

REGULAR.description:
While the Shinsengumi strive to maintain peace in the city of Edo, their commander Kondo is busy sulking in front of Otae, who now works at a snack bar. Depressed, Kondo calls himself a good-for-nothing. Otae gently smiles and tells him that she would love a man for his whole self, including his weaknesses. With those words, Kondo falls in love with Otae and asks her to marry him, but receives a knock-out punch instead. Undaunted, Kondo uses all sorts of means to show his affection for the immovable Otae. Finally having enough of it, Otae drags Gintoki into the situation, but things take an unexpected turn…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nebari Tsuyosa to Shitsukosa wa Kamihitoe
There Is but a Fine Line Between Persistence & Stubbornness
Zwischen Beharrlichkeit und Lästigkeit besteht ein haarfeiner Unterschied!
粘り強さとしつこさは紙一重

REGULAR.description:
From Hijikata to Okita, and Okita to the Shinsengumi, news quickly spreads of the commander losing in battle for a woman, stirring up commotion within the squad. To make matters worse, Kondo’s miserable loss is aired on TV, forcing Hijikata to figure out some way to gain back the Shinsengumi’s dignity. To do so, they must eliminate the silver-haired samurai who defeated Kondo. Hijikata joins the other members to search for Gintoki in town. Meanwhile, oblivious of single-handedly earning the Shinsengumi’s malice, Gintoki is yanked away to help with his client’s carpeting job. While the whining Gintoki helps out the client, the Shinsengumi closes in….
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fighting Should Be Done with Fists
Kenka wa Guu de Yarubeshi
Streitigkeiten regelt man mit den Fäusten!
喧嘩はグーでやるべし

REGULAR.description:
Prince Hata makes yet another visit to Edo. Heartbroken over the loss of Pes, the prince goes through every Edo city zoo determined to find the next cutest pet. Meanwhile, savoring her pickled seaweed, Kagura comes across a box left in front of the Odd Jobs Gin building. Her face lights up with a big smile when she finds an adorable animal in the box. The animal is a slightly…no, VERY big dog-like creature. Despite Gintoki’s protests, Kagura insists on keeping it. Kagura names the dog Sadaharu and plays rough with it, while Gintoki and Shinpachi grow exhausted from Sadaharu’s constant biting. What will Gintoki and Shinpachi do?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eat Something Sour When You`re Tired
Greift in Zeiten der Erschöpfung zu Saurem!
Tsukareta Toki wa Suppai Mono o
疲れたときは酸っぱい物を

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Kagura visit Shinpachi in the hospital after a car accident. Even in the hospital the Odd Jobs Trio is noisy as usual. An old man in the next room overhears their conversation and asks for their help. He requests that they look for a woman from the old man’s bittersweet memories. The only lead they have is a kanzashi, and that the kanzashi’s owner worked at a Dango shop. The Odd Jobs Trio begin their search but find that nobody seems to remember the Dango shop, and they quickly reach a dead-end. Kagura tries having Sadaharu trace the scent from the kanzashi, and the place Sadaharu leads them to is not at all what they expected…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bechabecha Shita Dango Nante naa~ Dango ja nee~ Bakayaroo~
Look, Overly Sticky Sweet Dumplings Are Not Real Dumplings, You Idiot!
Wässriges Dango ist kein Dango, Blödmann!
べちゃべちゃした団子なんてなぁ団子じゃねぇバカヤロー

REGULAR.description:
One night Otose, the landlord of Gintoki’s Odd Jobs, comes across a starving cat-eared Amanto named Catherine in the back alley and hires her to work at the Otose Snack House. Otose comes to take a liking to the hard-working and considerate Catherine. The Odd Jobs Trio on the other hand find themselves under a tighter budget and constant hunger thanks to Kagura’s hearty appetite. Meanwhile, a string of robberies occur in the downtown district. One day, the police make a visit to the Otose Snack House to gather any information regarding the recent robberies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daiichi Inshou ga Ii Yatsu ni Roku na Yatsu wa Inai
Ein positiver erster Eindruck kann täuschen!
People Who Make Good First Impressions Usually Suck
第一印象がイイ奴にロクなやつはいない

REGULAR.description:
Odd Jobs Gin receives a job to look for a missing person, the daughter of a distinguished government official who hasn’t returned home in days. Reluctantly accepting the client’s wish to settle the case quietly, the Odd Jobs Trio goes to gather information at a club where the girl was often sighted. Unable to get any useful leads and tired of looking, Kagura tries to nab a man who looks similar to the girl, when the man’s condition suddenly changes. According to a waiter, a weird drug is floating around this district. Meanwhile Gintoki is alone in the men’s room recovering from a massive hangover when somebody calls to him over the door.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cosplay Suru Nara Kokoro Made Kazare
If You`re Going to Cosplay, Go All Out
Wenn schon Cosplay, dann mit Herz!
コスプレするなら心まで飾れ

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Gintoki and Katsura, the space pirates ship is brought down. Several antiforeigner factions use this opportunity to take down high government officials who profited from their illegal drug collusion with pirates and Amantos. The Shinsengumi is ordered to provide protection for the officials. Kondo unquestioningly carries out his duty, claiming that if it weren’t for the government the Shinsengumi wouldn’t be where it is today. But the members cannot hide their frustration toward the corrupt Amanto and government officials. Amidst all of this, Kondo is shot down by the antiforeigner faction, taking the hit intended for a frog Amanto they were assigned to protect. Just when the Shinsengumi’s frustration is about to explode, they hear Hijikata shouting…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otoko ni wa Kaeru ni Sawarete Ichininmae Mitai na Wake no Wakaranai Ruuru ga Aru / Waki Dake Arattokya Iindayo Waki Dake
Um als echter Mann zu gelten, musst du erst einen Frosch berühren!
You Only Gotta Wash Under Your Armpits / Just the Armpits
男にはカエルに触れて一人前, みたいな訳の分からないルールがある / 脇だけ洗っときゃいいんだよ脇だけ

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki finds himself forced into looking after Sadaharu and is soon exhausted. That’s when Katsura shows up with a peculiar creature. Seems this thing is a gift from the space merchant Sakamoto and is called Elizabeth. Gintoki is surprised at the fact that Katsura, who supposedly hates space creatures, would keep such a pet. Then Gintoki and the gang learn that a TV show is looking for weird animals to appear on their show. Blinded by the grand prize given to the winner, Gintoki and the gang decide to participate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haustiere ähneln ihren Haltern!
Kainushi to Pet wa Niru
Pets Resemble Their Owners
飼い主とペットは似る

REGULAR.description:
Kagura sees Hasegawa wasting his time at the park in broad daylight and asks what he’s doing. Since he was fired from the Immigration Bureau after punching Prince Hata on a passing whim, Hasegawa now walks down the path of a Dumb Old Retarded Kook, DORK for short. Ordered by his superior to commit seppuku, Hasegawa returns home to pack up and skip town only to find his wife has already left, saying she can’t deal being with a DORKH (Dumb Old Retarded Kook Husband). Having lost everything, the only friend Hasegawa has now is Gintoki, whom he met at the pachinko parlor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Stop and Think About It, Your Life`s a Lot Longer as an Old Guy Than a Kid! Whoa, Scary!!
Kangaetara Jinseitte Ossan ni Natte kara no Hou ga Nagai ja Nee ka! Kowa!!
Umso älter man wird, umso länger wird das Leben!
考えたら人生ってオッさんになってからの方が長いじゃねーか! 恐っ!!

REGULAR.description:
The Kabukicho Neighborhood Association, led by Otose, marches toward the doorstep of Edo’s No. 1 inventor, Gengai Hiraga. The association has had it with Gengai’s noisy building of useless junk. Recruited by Otose, the Odd Jobs Trio fights sound with sound by blasting music from their karaoke machine but are stopped by the sudden appearance of the robot Saburo. The Odd Jobs Trio then proceed to relocate Gengai’s workshop to the nearby riverbank, only to end up breaking Saburo and the other robots created by Gengai, who were to perform for the shogun at the upcoming festival. Meanwhile a dangerous man has set foot into Edo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oyakotte no wa Iya na Toko Bakari Niru Mon da
Sons Only Take After Their Fathers` Negative Attributes
Väter und Söhne ähneln sich nur in ihren schlechten Eigenschaften
親子ってのは嫌なとこばかり似るもんだ

REGULAR.description:
Shinpachi returns home with a gift for his sister—a doll that oddly resembles Elizabeth, with the name “Space Monster Stefan” printed on its chest. But what awaits Shinpachi is a deadly naginata swing by the raged Otae. While Shinpachi narrowly dodges the attack, Stefan falls prey to the naginata. As she tears Stefan apart, Otae explains the reason behind her fit. It appears the panty thief who’s recently been stirring things up in Edo city stole her panties. To soothe her sister’s anger, Shinpachi decides to ask for help from Gintoki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aa Yappari Wagaya ga Ichiban da wa
Hach, bei uns zuhause ist es immer noch am schönsten!
Oh, Yeah! Our Crib Is Number One!
ああ やっぱり我が家が一番だわ

REGULAR.description:
There are men who try to earn an easy buck by settling their hopes on pachinko, only to fail miserably. Regretting their decision, Gintoki and Hasegawa are sucking on their ice candies bought with the dropped change they collected, when they overhear something about a moneymaking opportunity. A reward has been placed on a space creature that’s been haunting the beach. Gintoki and Hasegawa propose to fish out the alien and grab the reward, and the Odd Jobs gang head out to the beach. But what awaits them there is a deserted beach and an old man making yakisoba noodles at the beach house. And the reward in fact turns out to be…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umi no Mizu ga Naze Shoppai ka da to? Omeera Tokaijin ga Oyoginagara Youzoku Shitekukara Darou gaaa!!
Weshalb Meerwasser salzig ist? Weil ihr Großstädter ständig ins Meer pinkelt!
Why`s the Sea So Salty? Because You City Folk Pee Whenever You Go Swimming!
海の水がなぜしょっぱいかだと? オメーら都会人が泳ぎながら用足してくからだろーがァァ!!

REGULAR.description:
One hot summer night, as mosquitoes fill the air, the Shinsengumi immerse themselves in sharing scary tales. Inayama tells the tale of a female ghost dressed in a red kimono haunting the schoolhouse at midnight, only to find that the same ghost has appeared in the Shinsengumi station as well! More than half of the team falls victim to the ghost, each muttering about a woman dressed in red. Frightened by the unseen danger, Kondo decides to hire an exorcist to handle the situation. But these exorcists seem awfully shady-looking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Belt Conveyer wa Ki o Tsukero
Nehmt euch in Acht vor Fließbändern!
Watch Out for Conveyor Belts!
ベルトコンベアには気をつけろ

REGULAR.description:
Amidst a summer heat wave with no air conditioning, the Odd Jobs office quickly turns into a steam house. When Gintoki and Kagura fight over and break the Senpuki (fan), their only means of dealing with the heat, Gintoki reluctantly heads out to buy a new one – only to run into extreme difficulties. Every store tells him they no longer sell an obsolete product like the fan and recommends buying an AC instead, which is beyond Gintoki’s budget. Finally, Gintoki comes across a recycled goods shop called the “Earth Defense Army Base.” Upon entering the store, he finds himself embroiled with the female store owner’s battle to protect the “Senpuki (???)"…?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bist du ein Mann, bestellst du Schwertfisch!
If You Go to Sleep with the Fan On, You`ll Get a Stomachache, So Be Careful
Otoko Nara Toriaezu Kajiki! / Senpuuki Tsukeppanashi de Nechau to Ohara Kowashichau Kara Ki o Tsukete
男ならとりあえずカジキ! / 扇風機つけっぱなしで寝ちゃうとお腹こわしちゃうから気を付けて

REGULAR.description:
One morning Shinpachi makes his usual commute to the Odd Jobs to wake up Gintoki when he comes across an unbelievable sight. Right inside Gintoki’s room, sleeping next to him is a woman dressed in a kunoichi outfit! As she mixes some natto, the woman named Sachan tells Gintoki that that the two made a vow the night before to become husband and wife, even though the hung-over Gintoki has no recollection of what happened. Thus, the Odd Jobs are forced to let Sachan stay at their place as an unwelcome wife. Just when everyone thinks Ginotki’s unhappy days have begun, a single call for Sachan drastically changes matters….
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine Ehe ist gleichbedeutend mit einem Leben voller Irrtümer!
Kekkon to wa Kanchigai o Issho Shitsuzukeru Koto da
Marriage Is Prolonging an Illusion for Your Whole Life
結婚とは勘違いを一生し続けることだ

REGULAR.description:
Returning with the groceries, Kagura puts on a sudden arrogant attitude that is understandably justified - She won a trip to space at the local big-sale raffle! Without a moment of hesitation the Odd Jobs trio head off to the Space Port. Unfortunately Sadaharu cannot join as they are told no pets are allowed on board. Insisting on bringing Sadaharu with her, Kagura starts arguing with the staff while Sadaharu goes off to harass a man with shades sleeping at the departure lobby. Curiously, the man disappears into the crowd without noticing the giant animal biting at his head. Carrying the Odd Jobs trio, the space ship sets off, but a group calling themselves the “Moe Fighting Sprits” shows up to hijack the ship…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Komatta Toki wa Warattoke Warattoke
Lacht in sorgenvollen Zeiten, lacht!
When You`re in a Fix, Keep On Laughing, Laughing...
困ったときは笑っとけ笑っとけ

REGULAR.description:
Mademoiselle Saigo: one of the Four Royals of Kabukicho and a girly man known as the “demon.” After calling this person a freak, Gintoki ends up being forced to cross-dress and work at the “Girly Boy Club” run by him (her?). At the club Gintoki comes across Katsura, who is also dressed as a woman. Katsura protests that he is merely waiting for the right moment to escape, but no matter how Gintoki looks at it, Katsura seems to have completely blended in with a life surrounded by girly men. One day the two encounter Saigo’s son Teruhiko, who is being bullied. Seeing that the boy is troubled, Katsura tries to console him, but…?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cute Faces Are Always Hiding Something
Hübsche Gesichter haben definitiv etwas zu verbergen!
Kawaii Kao ni wa Kanarazu Nanika ga Kakureteru
カワイイ顔には必ず何かが隠れてる

REGULAR.description:
Gintama is celebrating its half-year run on the air! And so the Odd Jobs trio attempts to kill some time by airing some re-caps. But their true intentions are to draw away the others’ attention and eat as much meat as possible from the sukiyaki meal before them. Trying to read each other’s next moves, Gintoki and Shinpachi successfully trick Kagura and chow down, only to spill the pot all over the place. Realizing she’s been tricked, Kagura begins arguing with Gintoki. Amidst this gloomy atmosphere Shinpachi believes that in order to avoid another messy tragedy, it is imperative to secure the meat’s safety first. And at that moment another pot challenger arrives… with the battle for meat taking yet another turn for the chaotic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shared Soup Pot Is a Microcosm of Life
Im Nabe spiegelt sich das ganze Leben!
Nabe wa Jinsei no Shukuzu de Aru
鍋は人生の縮図である

REGULAR.description:
On Hasegawa’s request the Odd Jobs trio take his place to work at the Oedo Mart Convenience store for the day, but Kagura and Gintoki’s half-baked attitudes cause nothing but trouble for the customers. The only one who’s working seriously, Shinpachi cannot help but sigh at his friends’ incompetence when he notice a punk trying to shoplift some goods. When Shinpachi catches the thief, he realizes it is Takachin, his childhood friend back from temple school. Ever since the day Shinpachi betrayed his trust, Takachin became a target for bullying. But now Takachin claims to be feared since joining a team called the “Bulldogs.” To save his friend from walking down the wrong path, Shinpachi breaks into the “Maltese” gathering.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Be Shy: Just Raise Your Hand and Say It
Es sollte euch nicht peinlich sein, euch zu Wort zu melden
Hazukashigarazu ni Te o Agete Ie
恥ずかしがらずに手を挙げて言え

REGULAR.description:
At the Women’s Wrestling Arena Shinpachi roots for Otsu the fighting idol, Kagura gets all excited and storms into the ring, and Gintoki watches his friends in shame. Okita also happens to be there, and leads the trio down to the slums where they discover an underground coliseum called the “Rengokukan.” Investigating the high authorities’ support for these death matches, Okita points out Kidomaru, Rengokukan’s deadliest fighter in a demon mask, suggesting the Odd Jobs may find out something from following him. The gang scouts Kidomaru’s house, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Es gibt Dinge, die ein Schwert nicht zu schneiden vermag!
Katana ja Kirenai Mono ga Aru
Some Things Can`t Be Cut with a Sword
刀じゃ斬れないものがある

REGULAR.description:
On the morning astrology program Ms. Ketsuno declares with a smile that “Virgos with goatees who are brushing their teeth right now will die today...” Kondo, who was watching the show while brushing his teeth, can’t help but let out a wry sigh when Matsudaira thunders in, blasting away with his gun – the Shinsengumi’s involvement with the Rengokukan has come to light, and both are summoned to the castle. Baffled by Hijikata and Okita’s impulsive actions, Kondo enters a state of panic after learning he may be assassinated before arriving at the castle. Matsudaira, who now sees everything as possible assassins, summons Sachan as a counter measure to assassins. Hence the dangerous drive to the castle begins...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Things Never Come in Twos (But Bad Things Do)
Gute Ereignissen folgen niemals aufeinander, schlechte Ereignisse schon!
Ii Koto wa Renzoku Shiteokoranai Kuse ni Warui Koto wa Renzoku Shiteokorumon da
いい事は連続して起こらないくせに悪い事は連続して起こるもんだ

REGULAR.description:
Part 1: “Star Destroyer,” the enchanted sword that can even cut through stars – searching for this legendary weapon, one man goes on a sword hunt night after night. The man’s name is Gankeimaru, an Amanto training to become the strongest warrior, and he has come to Earth in search of the ultimate weapon worthy of his strength. Meanwhile Gintoki and Shinpachi learn that Kagura has been buying massive amounts of products from the shopping channel, and tells her to return them all. Upset from having all her items confiscated, Kagura comes up with an idea after spotting Gintoki’s wooden sword. It’s just the start of another messy situation...  /   Part 2: Kagura’s scream stirs up the Odd Jobs office. The cause? A cockroach! Thinking it’s an average cockroach, Gintoki and Shinpachi head out to kill it, only to retreat back on all fours. Why? Because it turns out to be a giant-sized cockroach! Around the same time, the TV reports multiple infestations of giant cockroaches throughout Edo city, and Prince Hata advises NOT to kill these Space Cockroaches, as it will attract more of them. Oblivious to such warnings, the Odd Jobs gang are about to exterminate the giant creature when it starts to scream...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awateruna! Cooling-off to Iu Mono ga Aru / Television to ka Shinbun to ka Chanto Minai to Dame Datte
Don`t Panic: There`s a Return Policy! / I Told You to Pay Attention to the News!
Ganz ruhig, es gibt schließlich das Rückgaberecht!
慌てるな! クーリングオフというものがある / テレビとか新聞とかちゃんと見ないとダメだって

REGULAR.description:
Newcomer Idol Tsu Terakado and Boy Band “Hansamu” leader Goemon’s passionate affair revealed! – The news plunges Shinpachi and the fan club members into the depths of depression. Gintoki is also stunned after learning that his favorite weather reporter Ms. Ketsuno is married. But while Kagura smirks at the two losers, Otsu shows up at the Odd jobs office.  Since the discovery of the relationship, Otsu has received numerous threatening letters and has come for Gintoki’s help, but she has no clue as to who the culprit is. Shinpachi is determined to protect Otsu with all his might by staying close to her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aidoru Datte Hobo Omaera to Onaji Koto Yattenda yo
Even Teen Idols Act Like You Guys
Pop-Idole tun das Gleiche wie ihr!
アイドルだってほぼお前らと同じことやってんだよ

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki finds himself lying on the ground, witnessing the blue sky gradually changing into red. Losing consciousness at the spot, Gintoki is rushed to the hospital. Turns out while on his way to buy Jump magazine on his bike, Gintoki was hit by a car driver who was talking on his cell phone. Shipnachi and the others rush to the hospital to see the now-conscious Gintoki, but learn he has no recollection of his own self… In order to somehow return the now honest and likable Gintoki back to his “dullish” personality, Shinpachi and Kagura take him back to the Odd Jobs office. But despite their efforts there are no signs of his memory returning. To find other possible events that may trigger his memory, the Odd Jobs wander through the streets of Edo but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doudemo Ii Koto ni Kagitte Nakanaka Wasurenai
Unwichtige Dinge vergisst man einfach nicht!
You Always Remember the Things That Matter the Least
どうでもいいことに限ってなかなか忘れない

REGULAR.description:
Two weeks have passed since Gintoki declared the disbanding of the Odd Jobs business and disappeared into the streets of Edo. Kagura sit and eats her pickled seaweed alone inside the ruined Odd Jobs office, which was destroyed by a spaceship. When Shinpachi comes to pick her up, Kagura tells him that she will not give up until Gintoki returns with his memories. Meanwhile Shinsengumi intelligence agent Yamazaki has infiltrated the Mamushi Factory where he finds some unexpected faces – The amnesic Gintoki and Kondo! Working diligently with a lively look on his face, Gintoki is now the building specialist for the “Jastaway.” But after the Jastaway explodes, Gintoki gets mixed up in another mess…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Leben fließt wie ein Fließband!
Jinsei wa Belt Conveyer no You ni Nagareru
Life Moves On Like a Conveyor Belt
人生はベルトコンベアのように流れる

REGULAR.description:
Having recovered from his amnesia, Gintoki attempts to renegotiate his overdue rent with Otose in celebration of his life starting anew. Instead, Otose cold-heartedly declares that unless the destroyed Odd Jobs office is repaired within a week, she will kick him out. Having no other choice, the trio try their hands on doing some unaccustomed carpenter work, but the task proves to be too difficult for the three amateurs. Irritated, Kagura and Gintoki lose control and create further destruction, when they receive a package sent by Sakamoto. Inside they find a letter, along with two little men. The two claims to be portable carpenters and begin rebuilding the Odd Jobs office…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Verwechseln von Namen ist unhöflich!
Hito no Namae to ka Machigaeru no Shitsurei da
Mistaking Someone`s Name Is Rude!
人の名前とか間違えるの失礼だ

REGULAR.description:
Members of the Otsu fan club are having a heated debate on the train about Otsu’s popularity being jeopardized by the appearance of TAMA, the cat-eared idol. After learning that fan club members are “cheating” with TAMA, Shinpachi delivers an iron-fisted punishment, which accidentally saves a girl who was being harassed by a drunken Matsudaira – and the girl turns out to be cat-eared! Shinpachi instantly falls for her cute looks, but panics after being asked out on a date by the girl, who is named Eromesu. Shinpachi tries to deal with the situation by asking for help on a web message board, but this only leads to further problems as the day arrives for his fateful date…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für die Liebe gibt es keine Anleitung!
Koi ni Manual Nante Iranai
Love Doesn`t Require a Manual
恋にマニュアルなんていらない

REGULAR.description:
Matsudaira summons Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita to the Ikedaya and informs the three of them that “You-know-who” is finally making his move. As tension runs high in the room, Matsudaira further declares it’s time for a “showdown.” Kondo and the others pledge their assistance to Matsudaira without really knowing whom this “You-know-who” is. When they find themselves at the amusement park and see a flirtatious man named Shichibei meet Kuriko, Matsudaira’s daughter, they realize Matsudaira is plotting to assassinate the man toying with his beloved daughter. Appalled by all of this, Hijikata decides to leave, but Kondo and Okita join in on the gig. And so begins the dramatic yet sad battle of men on a stake-out, ready to break up a couple’s date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für die Liebe gibt es keine Anleitung! - Teil 2
Koi ni Manual Nante Iranai: Enchousen / Soto Midake de Hito o Handanshicha Dame
Love Doesn`t Require a Manual (Continued) / You Can`t Judge a Person by His Appearance, Either
恋にマニュアルなんていらない 延長戦 / 外見だけで人を判断しちゃダメ

REGULAR.description:
Finishing up their night job, Otae and Oryo walk home under the morning sunlight. While casually badmouthing their customers the two witness Hanako, the new kid at their bar, attempting to throw herself off a bridge. Otae quickly stops her and brings her home, where she learns the deeply troubled Hanako left her hometown of Osaka in order to become a dancer. Hanako then explains how she spent all her savings after joining the Dream Faith – a weird religious cult that promises to grant the power to make dreams come true. The Odd Jobs go undercover with Hanako’s help, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Leute mit Dreck am Stecken reden mehr als andere!
People with Dark Pasts Can`t Shut Up
Sune ni Kizu ga Aru Yatsu Hodo Yoku Shaberu
すねに傷がある奴ほどよくしゃべる

REGULAR.description:
On his way back from buying Nikuman one snowy night, Gintoki comes across an old man dressed in red and a reindeer arguing. Gintoki offers his help after hearing Santa complain of being unable to finish his job after his sled was destroyed. When Gintoki brings a two-wheeled cart instead, Santa whine over how it needs to be a sled to preserve his reputation. But after being talked down by Gintoki, Santa ends up making his deliveries dressed in all black. And so begin the burglar-like Santa and Reindeer, AND Gintoki’s night of delivering dreams to the kids.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: People Who Say That Santa Doesn`t Really Exist Actually Want to Believe in Him / Prayer Won`t Make Your Worldly Desires Go Away! Control Yourself
Santa Nante Ineen da Yotte Iiharu Yatsu Koso Honto wa Irutte Shinjitaindayo / Bonnou ga Kane de Kieru kaaa Onore de Seigyoshiro Onore de
Typen, die behaupten, es gäbe keinen Weihnachtsmann, glauben doch an ihn!
サンタなんていねーんだよって言い張る奴こそホントはいるって信じたいんだよ / 煩悩が鐘で消えるかァァ 己で制御しろ己で

REGULAR.description:
Heavy snow falls upon the city of Edo. Otose’s voice rings through the winter wonderland, signaling the start of the Kabukicho Snow Festival! The highlight of the festivities is a snow figure-building contest with grand prize money. Entering the contest for the money, the Odd Jobs trio builds a snow figure claiming to be the “Neo Armstrong Cyclone Jet Armstrong Cannon.” Despite Shinpachi’s protests, everyone who visits the sculpture compliments its perfection. But Gintoki and Kagura, concerned over the other contestants’ works, begin sabotaging other snow figures.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nur Kinder toben ausgelassen im Schnee! / Im Winter Eis zu essen ist auch schick
Only Children Play in the Snow / During Winter, Eating Ice-Cream Is Sweet
Yuki de Hashagu no wa Kodoma Dake / Fuyu ni Taberu Ice mo Nakanaka Otsu na Mon da
雪ではしゃぐのは子供だけ / 冬に食べるアイスもなかなかオツなモンだ

REGULAR.description:
While trying to force his way out of a Shinsengumi inspection, Katsura is hit by Okita`s bazooka and injures his leg. He tries to escape by running across roofs, but he is mistaken for an underwear thief and is defeated by Ikumatsu, the owner of the ramen shop, Daigo Ramen. The next morning, Ikumatsu serves him ramen to apologize for the misunderstanding. While Katsura eats, Ikumatsu`s brother-in-law noisily enters the shop with his henchmen. The atmosphere turns volatile, and sensing Ikumatsu`s uneasiness, Katsura chases out the unwanted guests. Katsura learns from Ikumatsu and her brother-in-law`s conversation that Ikumatsu is a widow and that the Joi Faction is responsible for her husband`s death. Thus an emotionally scarred man and woman begin a strange life together…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Menu ga Ooi Ramen ya wa Taitei Ryuukoutte Inai
Ramen Shops with Long Menus Never Do Well
Ramen-Shops mit großer Speisekarte sind meist nicht gut besucht!
メニューが多いラーメン屋はたいてい流行っていない

REGULAR.description:
While Edo is abuzz with talk of the movie Alien vs. Yakuza, a real alien has snuck into Edo from outer space. Kondo gets a tip from renowned alien buster Umibozu and has the Shinsengumi set up a cordon. Meanwhile, Kagura has fallen for an “it`s me” scam, which is causing a sensation in Edo. Kagura obediently follows instructions given by a man claiming to be Gintoki and rushes off to the bank. Unfortunately, the alien also happens to be at the same bank. Worried about Kagura, Gintoki and Shinpachi also arrive at the bank. But Kagura, who is being swallowed by the alien, catches the two and tries to bring them down together. At that very moment, Umibozu appears before the bunch. Kagura is stunned to see him…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Give a Thought to Planned Pregnancy
Kinder zeugen sollte wohl überlegt sein!
Kozukuri wa Keikaku Teki ni
子作りは計画的に

REGULAR.description:
Fired by Gintoki, a depressed Kagura sits in the boarding area at the terminal with her father Umibozu. When he hears that Gintoki fired Kagura, Shinpachi lashes out and tells Gintoki to think of how much the Odd Jobs and Gintoki meant to Kagura. With that, Shinpachi announce to quit the Odd Jobs as well. Meanwhile, Kagura’s spaceship is about to take off. In the cargo hold, Prince Hata’s servant, Jii, has ordered that the prince’s cargo be organized, but the maintenance crew is terrified of the creepy cargo. Jii ends up breaking a vial, which is the beginning of an incident that will toss Edo into chaos…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Titel allein sagt noch lange nicht, ob ein Film spannend ist!
Title Dake ja Eiga no Omoshirosa wa Wakannai
You Can`t Judge a Movie by Its Title
タイトルだけじゃ映画の面白さはわかんない

REGULAR.description:
The alien continues to wreak havoc at the terminal when Gintoki appears on the scene with Sadaharu, only to be engulfed by the alien`s tentacles. Meanwhile, Umibozu finds Kagura fallen and injured after her attempt to save Prince Hata and Jii. Enraged, Umibozu seizes the two when Kagura stops and tells how proud she was of using her powers to save someone. The alien attempts to capture Kagura with its tentacles. Just as the alien is about to swallow her, Gintoki and Sadaharu come charging out of the alien`s mouth. Gintoki and Umibozu insult each other as they join forces to fight the alien. Meanwhile, in the sky, a Shogunate Battleship led by Matsudaira has appeared!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mimizu ni Oshikko Kakeru to Hareru yo
Pinkelt auf einen Regenwurm und euer Ding schwillt an!
You Know What Happens If You Pee on a Worm
みみずにおしっこかけると腫れるよ

REGULAR.description:
Umibozu leaves but Kagura decides to stay in Edo. Seeing her friends sitting pensively in the Otose Snack house, Kagura, feeling mischievous, spies on the bar from the outside. But soon her friends forget about their loneliness and move on to different topics: Gintoki`s crotch, beautiful women doctors, and the personalities of the female characters on the show… Soon talk centers on who will be the new heroine to fill in the Odd Jobs roster. Sachan, Otae, and Catherine begin a fierce battle over the slot. Who will the men choose to be the next heroine…?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Character wa Sillhouette dake Dokusha ni Miwake ga Tsuku You ni Agakiwakeyou
Make Characters So Anybody Can Tell Who They Are by Just Their Silhouettes
Zeichnet Charaktere so, dass man sie anhand ihrer Silhouetten erkennen kann!
キャラクターはシルエットだけで読者に見分けがつくように描き分けよう

REGULAR.description:
An evil magistrate named Chintaro Toyama captures Elizabeth. When Katsura bribes the Odd Jobs with food to save her, our heroes naturally accept. Recruiting the help of Sachan (after getting her fired from her job at a kunoichi café), the rescue team, a.k.a. Go-Ninja Spy Force, sneaks into the magistrate`s office. But the Shinobi Five, led by Zenzo Hattori, stands in their way. Zenzo is still bitter about his scuffle with Gintoki over a Jump comic on New Year`s Eve, while Sachan faces Kaoru, her rival from ninja school. Shinpachi, Kagura, and Katsura defeat their opponents with curry laced with a laxative, but things get dangerous when Kagura carelessly takes a bite of the curry… And then things get even crazier as Gintoki and Zenzo get into a heated debate about the “Pegasus Meteor Slash” pose, and Kaoru`s poison rose perfume attack goes off …
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mom`s Busy, Too, So Quit Complaining About What`s for Dinner
Mütter sind sehr beschäftigt, also beschwert euch nicht über das Abendessen!
Okaasan Datte Isogashiindakara Yuuhan no Menu ni Monku Tsukeru no Tomenasai
お母さんだって忙しいんだから夕飯のメニューに文句つけるの止めなさい

REGULAR.description:
One night, Gintoki comes back home after a long night of carousing, and sees that Sadaharu has become enormous. Gintoki and his crew are at a loss as to what caused this sudden growth, and the dog translation device that Gintoki got at the bar isn`t of any use. To make things worse for the bewildered threesome, Sadaharu gets even bigger, and when Sadaharu is shown on TV, Edo is thrown into an uproar. Curious bystanders barge into the Odd Jobs office, throwing rocks and injuring Kagura. Upon seeing this, Sadaharu…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aiken no Sanpo wa Tekido na Speed de
Geht mit angemessener Geschwindigkeit Gassi!
Walk Your Dog at an Appropriate Speed
愛犬の散歩は適度なスピードで

REGULAR.description:
In order to pay off the damages for Sadaharu`s rampage, Ane not only has to let go of her savings but her shrine as well, and goes to work at Cabaret Smile. She is able to have her way with men and becomes the shop`s drawing card. But she doesn`t get along with Smile`s other featured employee, Otae. The two clashes with each other, and when Otae beats up Ane`s main customer, the owner of Kikuya, Smile`s manager lays down a resolution. He`s going to fire the person who has the least total sales the following day. A ruthless battle between women is about to begin! But that night, Otae tells Ane that she`s not going to compete. However, this might be Otae`s first attack--!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adults Only. We Wouldn`t Want Anyone Immature in Here
Der Besuch von Nachtklubs ist erst mit 20 gestattet!
XX [Chome Chome] Asobi wa 20-Sai ni Natte Kara
××遊びは20歳になってから

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and the gang are suffering from the mother of all hay fevers. One theory suggests the cause is a plant from a far-off planet, but no facts are available, and when Otose is forced to close her shop due to hay fever, it becomes apparent this is a serious situation.  One day a new resident named Hedoro moves in to Kabukicho, and the Odd Jobs crew learn that the menacing-looking Amanto runs a flower shop right next to their office. When it turns out that all the pollens are originating from the shop, the Odd Jobs suspect Hedoro is trying to weaken the population with hay fever and take over the world. And then the trio find themselves having to deliver a circular to Hedoro…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Cherries Come from Cherry Trees?
Sakuranbotte Are Sakura no Ki ni Naru no?
Wachsen an Sakurabäumen eigentlich Kirschen?
さくらんぼってアレ桜の木になるの?

REGULAR.description:
The Shinsengumi capture one of the three Parco Brothers’ allies and the brothers go after Hijikata in retaliation. The youngest brother waits for Hijikata`s day off and sit next to Hijikata in a restaurant, preparing to strike, but the sight of the Hijikata Special, a bowl of rice topped with mayonnaise, and the Uji Gintoki-Don, a bowl of rice topped with a large helping of azuki beans, leads to an argument between Hijikata and Gintoki, and an unexpected knockout of the youngest Parco brother. The three Parco Brothers withdraw, but they haven`t given up on Hijikata yet. Little do they know that they will be drawn into Gintoki and Hijikata`s fierce battle of pride…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Niteru Futari wa Kenka Suru / Nande Are Yaru Kara ni wa Makecha Dame
The More You`re Alike, the More You Fight / Why Do You Use That Useless Negativity?
Was sich gleicht, streitet sich!
似てる二人は喧嘩する / 何であれやるからには負けちゃダメ

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Hasegawa visit a casino in an attempt earn some easy cash but before long they’ve lost everything and are stripped down to their loincloths. The two complain that they can`t win because evil spirits possesses them. But when a renowned gambler named Kanbe, the Luck Reader, arrives on the scene and helps them get their clothes back, Gintoki and Hasegawa take a hint from his suaveness, and try their hands at blackjack, only to wind up getting their clothes taken away again. Kanbe helps the two yet again, and after hearing his story Gintoki and Hasegawa learn the source of his luck…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Leben ohne Glücksspiel ist wie Sushi ohne Wasabi!
Gamble no Nai Jinsei Nante Wasabi Nuki no Sushi Miteena Mon da
Life Without Gambles Is Like Sushi Without Wasabi
ギャンブルのない人生なんてわさび抜きの寿司みてぇなもんだ

REGULAR.description:
Anime Gintama enters its second year on air! Well, more like manages to slide by for a second year. Either way it’s the second season, as the Odd Jobs crew reflect on “securing a one-year slot on air” and reminisce about the many events that occurred in the past year. As expectations of high ratings have given way to many hardships, Gintoki suggests that something needs to be done as the series continues on...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mitei wa Mitei de Atte Kettei Dewanai
Undecided Is Undecided and It`s Not a Decision
Unentschieden ist unentschieden und es ist keine Entscheidung
未定は未定であって決定ではない

REGULAR.description:
A baby is left on the doorstep of the Odd Jobs office with a message that says, “It`s your baby.” The baby has naturally curly silver hair and dead-fish eyes… in other words, the baby looks exactly like Gintoki, and everyone besides him believes without a doubt that the baby is his love child. Shinpachi, Kagura, and Otose all become smitten by the baby named Kanshichiro. Panicked over the idea of Kanshichiro really beng his child, Gintoki flees the Odd Jobs office with the baby. But with no one willing to listen to his side of the story, Gintoki is at a loss. Meanwhile, Kahei Hashida, the owner of a large financial combine, visits the Odd Jobs. Kahei wants the Odd jobs to find Ofusa, the woman who kidnapped his grandson Kanshichiro. But Otose senses something fishy…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Milch sollte ungefähr Körpertemperatur haben
Milk Should Be in the Temperature Like Human Skin
Milk wa Hitohada no Ondo de
ミルクは人肌の温度で

REGULAR.description:
Kahei is questioning the captured Ofusa about the whereabouts of baby Kanshichiro. When Shinpachi and Kagura, who are being chased by Nizo, come rushing in. Despite the commotion Kahei continues with his interrogation. Kagura makes a smoke screen while Shinpachi tries to save Ofusa, but Nizo is blind and smoke screens don`t work against him. The group ends up getting cornered. Meanwhile, Gintoki visits the Hashida residence with Kanshichiro, but he is unable to talk to the Kihei, the company president, because he doesn`t have an appointment. While Nizo corners Shinpachi and the others, Gintoki and Kanshichiro manage to get past the receptionists and onto an elevator…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito to Au Toki wa Mazu Appo(intment) o
Make an Appointment First Before Meeting With Someone
Wenn man zu einer bestimmten Person möchte, sollte man erst ein Appo vereinbaren
人に会うときはまずアポを

REGULAR.description:
Kabuki-cho has been plagued with a series of arsons. To prevent anyone from setting fire to garbage, rules about separating garbage have become stricter, so when Gintoki tries to sneak out magazines with the combustible garbage Otose sees him and gives him a lecture. But she unwittingly starts a small fire with a tossed-off cigarette, and when a panicky Gintoki tries to put the fire out, a young female fire fighter named Tatsumi sees him and mistakes him for the arsonist. Fortunately he’s cleared of any charges, but the leader of the fire fighters, who acts as Tatsumi`s father, shuns her, claiming that a woman cannot be a fire fighter. Even so, Tatsumi wants to become the best fire fighter in Edo and catch the arsonist, which interests Gintoki…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stress Causes Baldness. But, Paying Too Much Attention to Preventing Stress, Builds Up Stress Again. In the End There Is Nothing That We Can Do to it.
Stress ist die Ursache von Glatzköpfigkeit, aber wenn wir versuchen, keinen Stress aufzubauen, stressen wir uns dadurch noch mehr, also können wir im Endeffekt nichts dagegen unternehmen
Stress wa Hageru Genin ni Naru ga Stress o Tamenai You ni Ki o Kubaru to Sokode Mata Stress ga Tamaru no de Kekkyoku Bokura ni Dekiru Koto Nante Nani mo Nai
ストレスはハゲる原因になるがストレスをためないように気を配るとそこでまたストレスがたまるので結局僕らにできることなんて何もない

REGULAR.description:
A mother suddenly barges into the Odd Jobs office, wanting them to find her son Hachiro, who disappeared after coming to Edo. Though perplexed by the mother’s excessive concern, Gintoki and the gang begin their search for Hachiro. Using a photograph as a clue, they discover that Hachiro has undergone many plastic surgeries. They draw hair and a mustache on the photo for fun and a man named Hachiro who looks exactly like the man in the photo passes them by. Gintoki and the others are sure that this man is the Hachiro they`re looking for, and bring Hachiro and his mother together, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doko no Okaasan mo Daitai Onaji
Mothers Are the Same No Matter Where They Are
So ziemlich jede Mutter ist gleich
どこの母ちゃんもだいたい同じ

REGULAR.description:
Katsuo knocks Hachiro out and makes unreasonable demands of Kyoshiro, which Gintoki and the others oppose by acting as hosts. Kyoshiro stubbornly refuses Katsuo`s demands, and in response, Katsuo points a dagger at him as a warning, but Gintoki intervenes. Katsuo and his men leave because Katsuo`s favorite dog gave birth. Hachiro`s mother hears about the birth and follows them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beim Essen darf man keine Schmatzgeräusche von sich geben
Do Not Make That "Kuchakucha" Sound When Eating
Mono Taberu Toki Kuchakucha Koto o Tatenai
もの食べるときクチャクチャ音をたてない

REGULAR.description:
Edo is in an uproar about the serial kidnappings of women. The Shinsengumi goes overboard in cracking down and sees a sudden drop in their public image. Kondo invites pop idol Tsu Terakado to be chief for the day in order to call on Edo residents to prevent crimes, as well as to boost the Shinsengumi`s image. Otsu is eager to do her duty and begins reforming the Shinsengumi, beginning with the bureau`s regulations. The Odd Jobs Trio are asked by Otsu to accompany her dressed up as the uninspiring mascot character Makoto-chan. The Shinsengumi realizes who they are and a fight breaks out. While they fight, someone kidnaps Otsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichinichi Kyokuchou ni Ki o Tsukerottenmaiya-san
Nehmt euch vor dem eintätigen Hauptmann, Rottenmeier-san, in Acht
Take Note of the One-Day Director
一日局長に気を付けろッテンマイヤーさん

REGULAR.description:
Mutsu`s Pleasure Support Club tries to deliver batteries so powerful that one can power a space battleship to Aoki and Co. But a group of men dressed in black shows up and steals the batteries and the money. Mutsu asks the Odd Jobs to recover the batteries and the money and capture the Pleasure Support Club’s missing leader, Sakamoto. Gintoki and the others easily capture Sakamoto and go to Aoki and Co., but find no clues. Gintoki and the others are forced to go along with Sakamoto`s plan to go out gallivanting and drinking. As they totter down the night road, heading home, a group sneaks up behind them. Gintoki and Sakamoto realize the danger they`re in and reminisce about the past as they confront their attackers. Sakamoto fires a gun and bluffs the enemy into retreating so no one gets hurt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nakushita Mono o Sagasu Toki wa Sono Hi no Koudou o Sakanobore
Wenn du etwas verloren hast, dann überlege, was du an dem Tag gemacht hast, an dem du es verloren hast
You Must Go Back to the Day of Action When You Were Looking for Lost Items
無くした物を探すときはその日の行動をさかのぼれ

REGULAR.description:
Elizabeth comes to Yorozuya, but Katsura, who is always with her, isn`t there. Gintoki and the others are unsure how to treat Elizabeth. She doesn`t talk and is difficult to figure out. Shinpachi decides to serve her tea, but Elizabeth doesn`t react. He tries to serve her coffee next, but her attitude doesn`t change at all. Kagura decides to serve her a certain drink as a last resort. Upon being served that drink, Elizabeth quietly begins to shed tears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Croquette Bread Is Always Popular in Shops
In Kiosks sind Korokke am beliebtesten!
Uriden Dewa Yappa Croquette Pan ga Ichiban Ninki
売店ではやっぱコロッケパンが一番人気

REGULAR.description:
Kagura has snuck onto a suspicious ship where she fights Takasugi under the bright moonlight. Kagura senses an odd presence and is attacked from behind. She escapes Matako Kijima’s double pistols, but Henpeita Takechi is waiting for her with the ronin he leads. Kagura wreaks havoc, but in the confusion of battle, Matako hits her with a gunshot. Even though her shoulder and leg have been injured, Kagura fights on. Finally, she gets within the ship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Not Forget Where You Left Your Umbrella
Gebt Acht, dass ihr eure Regenschirme nicht irgendwo liegen lasst!
Kasa no Oki Wasure ni Chuui
傘の置き忘れに注意

REGULAR.description:
The Katsura’s Faction launches a midair battle against Takasugi to avenge Katsura, who was attacked by Nizo the Butcher. Nizo fights back with Benizakura, a sword-shaped weapon that has become fused with his arm. Meanwhile, Henpeita Takechi and Matako Kijima have captured Kagura. Shinpachi sneaks on board Takasugi`s ship and uses the confusion of a cannon shot to successfully save Kagura.  Meanwhile, Gintoki is headed to Takasugi’s ship along with Tetsuko, the younger sister of Tetsuya, the creator of the Benizakura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Sonne geht immer wieder auf!
Hi wa Mata Noboru
The Sun Will Rise
陽はまた昇る

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Nizo battle to the death on the deck of Takasugi`s ship. The anti-battleship weapon Benizakura has infiltrated Nizo`s mind, driving Nizo out of control. Gintoki fights back with a sword forged by Tetsuko. Nizo attacks with overwhelming strength, but slowly, the battle begins to turn in Gintoki`s favor. Meanwhile, within the ship, Takasugi plans to use the Benizakura to overthrow the shogunate, but he is confronted by Tetsuya, the man who forged the Benizakura, Tetsuya`s younger sister Tetsuko, and Katsura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Insects at Night Gather in the Light
Nachtinsekten sammeln sich im Licht!
Yamiya no Mushi wa Hikari ni Atsumau
闇夜の虫は光に集う

REGULAR.description:
Hijikata receives a report from Shinsengumi inspector Yamazaki about the struggle between the Katsura Faction and Takasugi Faction. Included is information on sightings of people who appear to be the Jacks-of-all-trades in the riot. Hijikata suspects that Gintoki has connections with the Antiforeigner Faction, so he orders Yamazaki to investigate Gintoki`s affairs. Yamazaki questions Gintoki`s friends, but he isn`t able to get anything out of them. At his wit`s end, Yamazaki ends up visiting the Jacks-of-all-trades. The Jacks-of-all-trades are out, but he gets information that Gintoki is receiving medical treatment at Shinpachi`s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Du bekommst nicht immer das was du willst!
Miira Tori ga Miira ni
What You Want Is Not What You Get
ミイラ捕りがミイラに

REGULAR.description:
Ninja Zenzo Hattori runs through the city at night. His job requires him to be on time and fulfill his clients` requests perfectly. The job: pizza delivery. One night, as Zenzo is about to land, Gintoki crashes his scooter into Zenzo`s backside. Ignoring the pain of his hemorrhoids, Zenzo grabs the pizza box to make his delivery. But instead of the pizza box, Zenzo accidentally grabs Gintoki`s Jump. Zenzo`s client, Okuni, takes the Jump and tells Zenzo that misfortune will befall his rear and that he should be careful.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Vorankündigungen für die nächste Jump-Ausgabe sind mit Vorsicht zu genießen!
Jump no Jigo Yokoku wa Ate ni Naranai
The Preview of the Next Edition of Jump Is Unreliable
ジャンプの次号予告は当てにならない

REGULAR.description:
Katsura, who is secretly a member of the Joi Faction, is visited by a reporter from the talk show The Edo. Katsura tells reporter Hanano that he wants the citizens to know about the work that the Joi Faction has done and think about what they can do for the country. Led by Okita, the Shinsengumi barges in, and Katsura is forced to run. He takes out a corn potage-flavored Nmaibo from his kimono and shows it to the Shinsengumi, explaining that he carries it around as emergency rations. The Shinsengumi continue to pursue him, and Katsura throws the Nmaibo onto the roof. The Nmaibo acts as a smoke screen, and Katsura and his group manage to escape.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eating Corn Is Unexpectedly Very Filling
Nmaibou wa Igai to Onaka Ippai ni Naru
Umaibo machen unerwartet satt!
んまい棒は意外とお腹いっぱいになる

REGULAR.description:
Stag beetle wrestling has become popular in Edo. Kagura enters Sadaharu 28, a dung beetle that she is fond of, into a competition. But Okita of the Shinsengumi barges in and defeats Kagura with his jumbo stag beetle. Meanwhile, Gintoki learns that stag beetles can be sold at high prices and plans to go to the forest to catch some. Kagura says that she wants to catch a stag beetle to avenge Sadaharu 28. The group heads to the forest, but they find the Shinsengumi already there, desperately looking for stag beetles …
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jungs, die Nashornkäfer halten, erfahren die Kostbarkeit des Lebens!
Shounen wa Kabuto Mushi o Tooshi Inochi no Tattosa o Shiru
The Boy Learns the Value of Life Through the Beetle
少年はカブト虫を通し生命の尊さを知る

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki is stuffing himself with dango at Konpeito, a quiet dango shop. The shop`s customers have been lured away by the sweets shop Andromeda, which is across the street. The owner persists in promoting his shop with his enthusiasm for dango. Gintoki learns that Sweets, the owner of Andromeda, is trying to drive Konpeito out of business because he wants the land. Konpeito`s owner won’t agree to Sweets’ proposition, so Sweets challenges him to a competition. Konpeito and Andromeda will invite people to eat dango, and the shop whose dango is most popular wins. The loser has to close up shop. Konpeito`s owner is hesitant, but Gintoki has a plan. The match begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hana yori Dango
Lieber satt durch Dango, als sich an Blumen laben!
Substance over Form
華より団子

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki gets robot puppeteer Gengai Hiraga to fix his bike. But when Gintoki tries to leave Gengai`s shop without paying the repair bill, Gengai activates the modification he had secretly made. Gintoki loses control of his scooter and crashes it into another scooter belonging to Amanto express messenger Noriko Mach. Now Noriko is injured and unable to ride her bike. But it turns out she has a special physical condition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Leben rast unaufhörlich voran, Minami-chan ist und bleibt die ideale Freundin!
Hashiri Tsuzukete Koso Jinsei / Risou no Kanojo wa Yappari Minami-chan
This Life That Continues to Run / Minami-chan Is Indeed the Ideal Girlfriend
走り続けてこそ人生 / 理想の彼女はやっぱり南ちゃん

REGULAR.description:
It is the day of a festival, but Gintoki and the others head to the temple grounds. Kagura complains that she wants to enjoy the festivities, but Gintoki tells her that they have to take over someone`s shift. Ochi, a man dressed up as a fallen samurai with an arrow in his head, appears before them. He manages the haunted house at the festival. Gintoki and the others have come to help him. Ochi tells them about how he was unappreciated by those around him, how he was downsized, how his wife left him, and how his only reason for living is running a haunted house splendidly. Gintoki and the others become concerned for him and try to help, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There Are Ghosts to Be Found Everywhere
Wataru Seigen wa Obake Bakari
Wie ein Spukhaus ist das Leben voller Schrecken
渡る世間はオバケばかり

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki tosses out his magazines on the day for combustible garbage pickup. Scared off by a terrifying commercial, Gintoki goes back to retrieve his magazines, but passes out after seeing a woman`s severed head at the dumping ground. The next day, Gintoki wakes up in his room and is relieved when he thinks it was just a dream, only to find the severed head in Kagura`s hands. Shinpachi informs the panicked Gintoki that it’s the head of an Etsuko, a popular mechanical maid. Gintoki and the others are unable to get a body for the bodiless Etsuko when they hear breaking news. Professor Hayashi, the Etsuko`s creator, has been killed, and there is a warrant out for Fuyo, his prototype mechanical maid . Fuyo`s characteristics match that of the head that Gintoki and the group have…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gomi no Bunbetsu Kaikyuu ni Gokyoryoku Kudasai
Helft mit bei der Mülltrennung!
Please Separate Your Garbage
ゴミの分別回収にご協力下さい

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and the gang are suddenly attacked by maids and split up into two groups. Gintoki and Kagura act as decoys to draw away the enemy maids, while Shinpachi takes Tama to Gengai. Tama tells Shinpachi that he has a 5 percent chance of surviving and suggests that he should leave her and run away. But Shinpachi tells her that a samurai protects the person they have sworn to protect no matter what. His words stir a mysterious sensation within Tama that she was not programmed to feel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cute Things Become Disgusting When There Are Too Many
Kawaii Mono mo Oosugiru to Kimochi Warui
Zu viel Niedliches auf einem Haufen ist unheimlich!
可愛いモノも多すぎると気持ち悪い

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and the others rush to Number 502, who plans to take control of Edo with machines. They head to the terminal in Gengai`s tank. Gengai and the tank are lost in an attack by a giant maid. Gintoki parts ways with Kagura and Sadaharu, and heads further in with Fuyo. Gintoki and Fuyo finally confront 502. 502 tries to welcome Fuyo as a reincarnation of his daughter, but Fuyo refuses. Obeying the words of late Professor Hayashi to give his daughter a smile, she tries to destroy 502, who has gone out of control!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kesenai Data mo Aru
Manche Daten kann man einfach nicht löschen!
There Is Data That Cannot Be Deleted
消せないデータもある

REGULAR.description:
Katsura is reporting the shogunate`s recent activities at a salon where Joi faction members gather. But the faction members are only interested in talking about the latest popular drama and don`t listen to what he says. Katsura becomes angry and leaves the salon. He proceeds to a video rental store. When he tries to rent a video, the store employee asks him to show his driver`s license as identification, but as a fugitive, he doesn`t have a license. Meanwhile, Gintoki has gone to a driving school to take lessons after having his license suspended. When he gets into a passenger seat as part of a joint exercise with the other students, he finds Katsura in the driver`s seat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fahrt mit einem Vielleicht am Steuer, Hundefressnäpfe verströmen einen verlockenden Geruch!
Kamoshirenai Unten de Ike / Inu no Nikudama wa Koubashii Nioi ga Suru
Let`s Drive There / Doggy Meatballs Have a Fragrant Smell
かもしれない運転でいけ / 犬の肉球はこうばしい匂いがする

REGULAR.description:
The Odd Jobs gang has gone to the mountains to go hunting for matsutake mushrooms. Gintoki is in high spirits, but a hunter named Marinosuke appears before him and warns him to leave the mountain quickly because it`s dangerous. But Gintoki and the others don`t listen and are intent on finding matsutake mushrooms. Masamune, a giant bear that`s being controlled by a space mushroom, appears before the group! Gintoki and the others escape thanks to Marinosuke. They try to fight Masamune to collect a reward. But a mushroom just like the one controlling Masamune is growing out of Gintoki`s head!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Findet ihr Matsutake-Pilze wirklich so lecker? Lasst euch das lieber nochmal durch den Kopf gehen!
Matsutakette Oishii Mon na no ka Ichido Yoku Kangaete Miyou
The Mushrooms Are Delicious
そんなに松茸って美味しいもんなのか一度よく考えてみよう

REGULAR.description:
One day, Kagura and the others notice that Catherine`s eyebrows are on the verge of connecting. While the group is watching a report about an accident nearby where a truck fell over on its side, Catherine comes back and her eyebrows have connected. Catherine becomes violent for some reason and attacks Otose. When things settle down, Otose`s eyebrows are also connected! Gintoki and the others run away from the strange incident. Then they notice that people with connected eyebrows are attacking people all over the place. Edo is placed under emergency alert, and people are forbidden from touching people with connected eyebrows. A great tragedy is descending upon Edo…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mangaka Has to Stock Up Enough Drafts to Be Qualified
Ein guter Mangaka hat reichlich für die Schublade gearbeitet, bevor er eine Serie startet!
Mangaka wa Genkou no Stock ga Dekite Koso Hitorimae
漫画家は原稿のストックが出来てこそ一人前

REGULAR.description:
Despite the danger of being canceled, Gintama has reached its second year. Gintoki claims that they were able to overcome it through manipulation, but Shinpachi reveals that they were almost canceled because of that. The Odd Jobs keep talking on and on and discover something terrible. They used up half a year`s worth of their production money on the episodes up to now! They decide to look back on the past 75 episodes, but for some reason, the theme song is Otsu`s “Your Mother is a XX.” Thinking it a bad idea to change the theme song, they put out a Prince Hata version of the opening sequence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Beschwer dich nicht im Haus über deinen Job, sondern außerhalb!" Und deswegen werde ich mich jetzt ein bisschen beschweren, in Ordnung?

Shigoto no Guchi wa Ie de Kobasazu Soto de Kobose! Tte Iu Kara Chotto Kobasasete Moraukedone "Samurai no Kuni" Bokura no Kuni ga Sou Yobareteita no wa Ima wa Mukashi no Hanashi... to ka Itte Hajimatta Kono Anime mo Haya Ichinen Han, Anna Koto Konna Koto Irunna Koto ga Attayone, de, Sorosoro Iroiro Furikaette mo Ii Kana - to Omotta no "Chee Nanda yo Soushuuhen ka yo, Teneki Ja ne?" to ka, Anime Datte Tsukuru no Taihen Nan Dakara Monku Iu no Yamenasai!

Someone Said "Don`t Complain About Your Job at Home, Do It Somewhere Else" So Let Me Complain. It`s Already Been a Year Since This Anime, Which Began with, "Land of the Samurai. The Days When Our Country Was Called That Are Long Past." A Lot of Things Have Happened Since Then. So I Thought, It Might Be a Good Time to Look Back, but Then Someone Said, "Tsk, a Recap Episode. Isn`t That Slacking?" Look It`s Hard Work Putting Together an Anime, So Stop Complaining!
仕事のグチは家でこぼさず外でこぼせ! って言うからちょっとこぼさせてもらうけどね「侍の国」僕らの国がそう呼ばれていたのは今は昔の話... とか言って始まったこのアニメもはや一年半, あんな事こんな事いろんな事があったよね, で, そろそろ色々振り返ってもいいかなーと思ったのに「チェッなんだよ総集編かよ, 手抜きじゃね?」とか, アニメだって作るの大変なんだから文句言うのやめなさい!

REGULAR.description:
One night, Hijikata visits the Smile Snack House. He ignores the girls making a fuss over him and designates Otae to be his host. He has a request—he wants her to act like Kondo`s wife and destroy his arranged marriage. The person that Kondo is set to marry is the third princess of planet Orangutan. She looks exactly like a gorilla. Continually dumped by Otae, Kondo is at his limit and might accept the marriage. If he does, the Shinsengumi would have to respectfully call a gorilla(-like woman) “sister.” Other Shinsengumi members appear and beg desperately, but their begging is in vain, and Otae beats them up. Then, a dashing samurai comes to see Otae. His name is Kyubei Yagyu, and he is Otae`s childhood friend…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In solchen Momenten schweigt man und kocht Sekihan!
Quietly Cook Red-Bean Rice at This Time
Sou Iu Toki wa Damatte Sekihan
そういう時は黙って赤飯

REGULAR.description:
Kyubei declares that he`s going to take Otae as his wife. Shinpachi is confused by the sudden turn of events, but he remembers Otae`s tears as they separated and charges into the Yagyu mansion with Kondo! Gintoki, Kagura, Hijikata, and Okita come to help. A fierce battle against the Great Four Yagyu and Kyubei begins!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feinde von gestern sind auch Feinde von morgen!
Kinou no Teki wa Kyou mo Nanyakanya de Teki
Yesterday`s Enemy Is Also Today`s Enemy
昨日の敵は今日もなんやかんやで敵

REGULAR.description:
Okita and Kagura break through the front lines and clash with Nishino, a large man who`s one of the Great Four. But Okita and Kagura are on bad terms and end up hurting each other. Kagura injures her right hand and Okita injures his right leg. The two decide to cooperate rather than lose and take on Nishino once more by piggyback! Meanwhile, a battle between Hijikata and Kitaoji begins at a dinner table. Hijikata`s sharp fighting intuition becomes a handicap. He becomes cornered by Kitaoji, who makes use of feints. But Hijikata is used to battle, and slowly he adapts himself to his opponent`s fighting style and shows his true power!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Person Who`s Picky with Food Is Also Picky with Humans.
Personen, die wählerisch beim Essen sind, sind auch wählerisch im Bezug auf Menschen!
Tabemono no Sukikirai ga Ooii Hito wa Ningen no Sukikirai mo Ooii
食べ物の好き嫌い多い人は人間の好き嫌いも多い

REGULAR.description:
Upon seeing Minato`s defeat of Okita, Tojo, the leader of the Great Four, finally makes his move! Kyubei goes along with him to the battlefield. As the battle shows signs of intensifying, Kondo and Gintoki are already in terrible danger in the bathroom. They finished doing their business, but they have no toilet paper! Furthermore, Tojo has appeared before their stalls. They are like rats in a trap!! What is the fate of these two men who have run out of toilet paper?!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If There`s Four People, It Is a Lot of Knowledge
Versammle vier Personen an einem Ort und du erhälst die verschiedensten Weisheiten!
Yonin Soroeba Ironna Chie
四人揃えば, いろんな知恵

REGULAR.description:
After Kondo and Tojo`s battle, Gintoki and Binbokusai`s battle finally begins! Gintoki struggles against the monkey-like agility of Binbokusai, the strongest member of the Yagyu Family. Meanwhile, Shinpachi has charged into the mansion and has finally found Otae. He tells her everyone`s feelings, but Otae stubbornly rejects them. What happened between her and Kyubei? The final battle to settle the many grudges between the Yagyu clan and the Kodokan members is about to begin!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Person That Wears Glasses Suddenly Takes the Glasses Off, It Feels Like Something Is Missing. Like the Part of the Person Is Missing.
Fudan Megane o Kaketeru Yatsu ga Megane o Hazusuto Nanka Mono Tarinai Parts ga Ikko Tarinai Ki ga Suru
Wenn Brillenträger ihre Brille abnehmen, hat man das Gefühl, dass irgendetwas an ihnen fehlt!
普段眼鏡をかけてる奴が眼鏡を外すとなんかもの足りない パーツが一個足りない気がする

REGULAR.description:
Kyubei`s harsh past is revealed, and Otae finally reveals her true feelings to Gintoki and the others. The Kodokan members defeat the Great Four Yagyu and gather one by one. Finally, the final showdown between Gintoki and Shinpachi and Kyubei and Binbokusai finally begins. Shinpachi gets back the glasses he had lost and overwhelms Kyubei. Binbokusai`s quick wits get Gintoki in danger! Neither side will back down in this fierce battle. The conclusion of the battle between the Yagyu clan and the Kodokan members finally comes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Woman`s Best Make Up Is the Smile
Das schönste Make-up einer Frau ist ihr Lächeln!
Onna no Ichiban no Keshou wa Egao
女の一番の化粧は笑顔

REGULAR.description:
Hamiko, the daughter with a history of serving the shogunate, has come to Gintoki and the bunch to ask them to do a job for her once again. Hamiko says that she`s completely quit "Paradise" because of the Harusame incident. But something terrible is happening to her boyfriend, Tasuke. Tasuke, a "Paradise" dealer, has decided to quit his organization and live an honest life with Hamuko. But when he learns the secret about "Paradise" not only can he not quit, but he is chased by Amanto from the organization as well…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für`s Glück spielt Status keine Rolle!
It`s Not Like I Line Up for Ramen. I Line Up for Satisfy Myself.
Ramen no Tame ni Narabunjanai. Jikomanzoku Tame ni Narabunda.
ラーメンのために並ぶんじゃない. 自己満足のために並ぶんだ / カワイイを連発する自分自身をカワイイと思ってんだろお前ら

REGULAR.description:
A cold is spreading at the Smile Snack House, and most of the hostesses have taken sick leave. An important customer is coming the next day, but Otae is the only one at the shop in good health. Desperate to round up some hostesses, the store manager asks Gintoki and the gang to bring in some cute girls. But everyone aside from Kagura is unenthusiastic about it. Just then, Kyubei comes in to the shop with refreshments for Otae.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für`s Glück spielt Status keine Rolle!
Rank Has Nothing to Do With Luck
Un ni Jibun wa Kankeinai
運に身分は関係無い

REGULAR.description:
Heiji Kozenigata enjoys being a hardboiled detective. His day is always filled with hardboiled happenings… One night, Heiji goes after his sworn nemesis, the great criminal Chogoro Kitsunebi, whom he has been chasing after for ten years. But during his chase he is stopped by the Odd Jobs gang, letting the Kitsunebi gets away. Forced to take responsibility for his continuous failure to capture the Kitsunebi, Heiji is placed under house arrest. Gintoki and the gang respond to the news by...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hard-boiled Egg on a Man`s Heart
Männer sind im Herzen hart gekochte Eier!
Otoko wa Kokoro ni Katayude Tamago
男は心に固ゆで卵

REGULAR.description:
Chogoro Kitsunebi sends a message announcing his next crime! His target is the golden deep-fried tofu statue on display at the Oedo Art Museum. The police are determined to stop the crime to maintain the dignity of the magistrate. “Kitsunebi has become just another burglar. I`ll catch him myself,” Kozenigata says. Kozenigata, who has been chasing Kitsunebi for over ten years, goes to the scene of the crime along with the Odd Jobs trio, despite the fact that he`s on house arrest. Gintoki and the others try to force their way into the heavily guarded art museum. But at that moment, Kitsunebi appears and throws everything into confusion…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hard-Boiled Egg Won`t Get Crashed
Hart gekochte Eier werden tausend Jahre alt!
Katayude Tamago wa Tsuburenai
固ゆで卵は潰れない

REGULAR.description:
Mitsuba, Okita’s older sister, pays a visit to the Shinsegumi headquarters to announce her marriage. The squad members are shocked to see Okita’s change in attitude when in front of Mitsuba. The two spend some time together for the first time in years. Mitsuba, who has always looked after her younger brother since he was little, is worried if Okita is doing fine in the Shinsengumi. In order to reassure his sister, Okita introduces his “best friend” Gintoki to Mitsuba, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gerade weil man Schäfchen zählt, findet man oft keinen Schlaf!
There Are Many Instances Where You Cannot Get to Sleep Even After Counting Sheep
Tsuji Kazoeru no Jitai ni Muchuu ni Aattarishite Kekkyoku Nemurenai Koto mo Ooi
羊数えるの自体に夢中になったりして結局眠れない事も多い

REGULAR.description:
Mitsuba’s fiancé Kuraba turns out to be a corrupt merchant who sells illegally obtained weapons to the Joi Faction members. Wishing for her sister’s happiness, Okita tries to overlook Kuraba’s crime. But as the Shinsengumi, Hijikata must expose Kuraba. As their mixed emotions build up, the rift between the two widens. In the midst of this turmoil, Mitsuba’s condition takes a sudden turn for the worse after being hospitalized. Okita, Gintoki, and Kondo rush to the hospital, but Hijikata continues to keep a look out for Kuraba.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Use German Suplex on Women Who Like to Ask Which Is Important, Me or Work
Was ist dir wichtiger, Schatz? Ich oder deine Arbeit?
Watashi to Shigoto Docchi Daiji na no Toka Iu Onna ni wa German Suplex
私と仕事どっちが大事なのとかいう女にはジャーマンスープレックス

REGULAR.description:
Ever since the Kodokan feud, Kyubei has completely opened up to Otae and has regained her cheeriness. Tojo has secretly been trying to help Kyubei find her happiness as a woman, but all his efforts go down in vain. Furthermore, he finds something terrifying in Kyubei`s room. Gintoki and the gang console Tojo and decide to hold a speed dating to help make Kyubei more feminine. The groups work to gather participants to participate in the date, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der größte Spaß an Gokons ist die Vorfreude!
Goukon wa Hajimaru Made ga Ichiban Tanoshii
The Start Is Always the Happiest in Joint Parties
合コンは始まるまでが一番楽しい

REGULAR.description:
One morning, Gintoki, Shinpachi and Kagura wake up in darkness. “Wake up,” a voice in their heads says. The three are unable to understand the situation and go back to sleep. “Release your inner power,” the voice persistently tells them. But Gintoki and the others ignore it and stay fast asleep. Offended by their rude behavior, the owner of the voice shows himself. Amazingly, it is Lake Toya, the immortal who lives within Gintoki`s wooden sword! The immortal tells them that he will teach them powerful secret techniques. In response, the three…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Unglück kommt selten allein!
Nido Aru Koto wa Sando Aru
When There`s Two, There Will Be Three
二度あることは三度ある

REGULAR.description:
While attracting customers for a cabaret club, Madao, a completely hopeless man, is hospitalized after being hit by a runaway car. After his repeated misfortunes, what saved the dispirited Hasegawa was Miss Uchino and her devoted caring. Wanting to somehow show his appreciation before leaving the hospital, Hasegawa notices that Uchino has been acting odd the past several days. It seems she has fallen in love with one of her patients. With some help from Gintoki and the gang, who are hospitalized in the same room after some food poisoning, Hasegawa attempts to help Uchino’s love succeed, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Scary to Eat the Wrong Food When It`s So Delicious
Je leckerer das Essen, desto schlimmer, wenn es verdorben war!
Oishii Mono Hodo Ataru to Kowai
美味いものほど当たると恐い / 銀さん透明人間になるの巻

REGULAR.description:
Kagura has gotten fat because of her recent degenerate lifestyle. She goes to Otae for advice, but Otae has also gotten fat from eating too much ice cream. Satchan laughs at the both of them for becoming fat, but she has also gotten fat… The three spurred to do something about their situation. They join a famous fasting dojo in town. There they run into Otose, Catherine, and even Kyubei…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Want to Slim Down, Go and Exercise, Do Not Eat
Ihr wollt abnehmen? Dann bewegt euch und hört auf zu essen!
Yasetai Nara Ugoke Taberuna
やせたいなら動け 食べるな
